notes: Trajectories and spin densities for the bulk hydrated electron at the MP2 level of theory.  The data represent the first ab initio molecular dynamics study of the hydrated electron in the bulk using many-body wave function theory.
title: Dynamics of the Bulk Hydrated Electron from Many‐Body Wave‐Function Theory
